description.gold-silver:
An attack based on
lack of loyalty.
description.crystal:
An attack based on
lack of loyalty.
description.ruby-sapphire:
An attack that is stronger
if the TRAINER is disliked.
description.emerald:
An attack that is stronger
if the TRAINER is disliked.
description.firered-leafgreen:
This attack move
grows more powerful
the less the user
likes its TRAINER.
description.diamond-pearl:
A full-power attack
that grows more
powerful the less
the user likes its
Trainer.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.shortEffect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
